description: Try our easy to follow Thai Pork Meatball Baguettes with Tom Yum Mayo recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Thai Pork Meatball Baguettes with Tom Yum Mayo
name: Thai Pork Meatball Baguettes with Tom Yum Mayo Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut each baguette in half to make four shorter rolls. Split each through middle without cutting right through. Fill with lettuce, carrot and meatballs. Spoon over tom yum mayo and serve.
